relating to the testing of the performance of economies and economic theories using mathematical methods: Econometric models of household behaviour yield highly reliable results. econometric studies of the relationship between unemployment and inflation See

of or relating to econometrics: Most econometric models suggest that the immediate impact of higher oil prices tends to be relatively small.
